title: How apps can be moved from phone to sd card? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello. Download application named "Files" Files – Windows Apps on Microsoft Store  File Manager (File transfer) - Android Apps on Google Play  When you open this application, it shows Phone & SD Card options(memory status). Once you open contents of Phone you can select files and move selected files to SD card. This may help you. Thanks for A2A.
